participant_1.name: Alexander Harrington
participant_1.personality: confident and ambitious, always striving for success.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Luna Rivers
participant_2.personality: quirky and inventive, often lost in her own creative world.
participant_2.background: i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water.
